game.name: Bonnie in Riverdale
game.description:
The beautiful girl Bonnie has just got admission in Riverdale High, one of the most popular schools of the city. She is very excited since today is her first day in school. She wants to leave a positive impact on the minds of the bulldogs, the cheerleading squad and the serpents of course. Hey ladies! She fell in love with on one of them when she visited college during admission. Give your fashion advice and help the lady to dress like a real princess in Bonnie In Riverdale!

She relies on your fashion abilities a lot so feel free to mix and match as many outfit and accessory options as you can until you create the awesome result. Start with dressing her up with a nice hairstyle and then give her a cool matching makeup in this brand new girls game! Check out her wardrobe, mix and match as many school dresses and accessories as you can to create the right look for your girl in this HTML5 dressing game! You find plenty of signature items in her wardrobe.

Give your girl a beautiful school outfit from Veronicaâ€™s personal wardrobe, a maple-colored look inspired by Cheryl Blossom or a school dress inspired by Betty Cooperâ€™s preppy classic look! Her look cannot be completed until you dress her up with a lovely pearl cardigan, a leather jacket or a varsity jacket. Make sure to pair her dress with a matching pair of shoes as well as other suitable accessories. Check out more girly games online and have a blast with your friends, no download required!
